Class Users

java.lang.Object
database.repository.Repository<User>
database.repository.repos.Users
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRepository<User>
public class Users extends Repository<User>
Repository class for managing User entities in the database.

This class provides methods for performing CRUD operations on the "Users" table, including creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting users. It extends the Repository class, which provides base functionality for database operations.

Author:
Dhruv

  • Method Details

    • create

      public User create(User user)
      Creates a new user in the "Users" table.

      This method hashes the user's password before inserting the user into the database.

      Specified by:
      create in interface IRepository<User>
      Overrides:
      create in class Repository<User>
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be created.
      Returns:
      The created User object, with its ID set.

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The User object corresponding to the provided ID, or null if not found.

      public User build(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException

    • update

      public User update(User user)
      Updates an existing user's information in the "Users" table.

      This method re-hashes the password if it is updated.

      Specified by:
      update in interface IRepository<User>
      Overrides:
      update in class Repository<User>
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated information.
      Returns:
      The updated User object if the update was successful, or null if no rows were affected.

    • validateLogin

      public boolean validateLogin(String userName, String plainPassword)
      Validates a user's login by comparing the hashed password stored in the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      plainPassword - The plain-text password provided by the user.
      Returns:
      true if the login is valid, false otherwise.

    • doesUserExist

      public boolean doesUserExist(String userName)
      Checks if a user already exists in the database based on their userName.
      Parameters:
      userName - The username to check for existence.
      Returns:
      true if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • getReviewersNotRatedByUser

      public List<User> getReviewersNotRatedByUser(int userId) throws SQLException
      Returns a list of all reviewers that a user hasn't yet rated.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who is rating/trusting reviewers.
      Returns:
      A list of reviewers not yet rated by the specified user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs during the retrieval of reviewers.
